name: Mr Fish üêü
greetingText: I think the person who gave you this name is a genius btw !
wishText: May you always be happy and healthy and cute and annoying and fun! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday my old man!! I waited all year for this day, I AM SO SO SO HAPPY THAT YOU WERE BORN 30 YEARS AGO TODAY. You are genuniely the most precious and important person to me ever. I really really cherish you and I wish you a lot of happiness and success in life. Thank you for being YOU and for everything you've done for me. I hope the next year will be a lot better for you and all your dreams come true. May you be blessed with the all the hapiness of the world and even more.              SEE YAAAA‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again since you loved it so much.
